overview: Based on Wattpad novel by Poppi Pertiwi. The leader of Ravispa's gang is named Galaksi Aldebaran who often clashes with Kejora, a member of the paskibra at his school. This fact makes Avegar's gang use the girl as bait to continue to fuel a fight with Ravispa. Because he often interacts with Kejora, Galaksi starts to like the girl. However, will their relationship be successful when many problems arise afterward?
title: Galaksi
